attributes.review: Where do I even begin with this app, I canâ€™t believe itâ€™s even allowed on the App Store. I downloaded this to show my support for our handsome and amazing president. As soon as I open the app what happens? My dog vomits all over me. And THEN, my cat scratches my eye. Iâ€™m starting to think my pets are nasty liberalsğŸ™„. Anyway I open the app and after cleaning up my injuries am BOMBARDED with ads. Not only was it annoying but the ads were extremely explicit. Over the course of using this app I got ads for pornography such over thirty times. My young son butchy asked what they were and I had to EXPLAIN. Now u may thing all of this is not that bad but wait til u here this. Ofc I wanted to support the president, so I decided to donate. Now I work at McDonalds and donâ€™t get payed a lot so I could only donate three cents, but itâ€™s the thought that counts. Low and behold I check my credit card history later and $3000 has been worhdrawed from my account?!! I KNEW it was the app because the only time I ever spend that much money is to get my spray tan( I use the same shade trump does ofc)  Iâ€™m FURIOS. Iâ€™ve have been a trump supporter for twenty years and I think I might have to vote for Baron now if I donâ€™t get a refund. I have now realized also that this app gives you a virus as well, everytime I go onto my illegal stuffed animal murder website, I get harassed by pop up ads to vote for trump. I have no idea why he payed for ads on that website but I clicked on one once and it took me to the app. Now my phone runs very slowly and everytime I download the feet pics I buy it takes FOREVER. Anyway long story short do NOT GET THIS APP. It scans you and will RUIN your lifeğŸ˜”.
